page.title: 05West Wood Rubbish Tips.
page.content: In between the housing at Weston and the housing at Netley is a large open space containing the area known as West Wood. It sounds picturesque but in fact for many years gravel was dug out from this area and the vast hole is being filled in with{rubbish. Actually part of the area has been filled and some work has been done to landscape the tip and make it into a park.There is even talk of a Nine Hole Golf Course to be built here but at the moment it seems to be only talk.Who knows though in a few years time everything might be different. This could become a realy pleasant {leisure area.
